title: [JIT] test_traced_module never runs its trace
body_html:
It is missing nderivs=0 so it never runs and silently passes. When I fix it, I then get:

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_jit.py", line 174, in test_traced_module
    out2 = lstm(input, (hx, cx))
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 259, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 361, in __new_forward
    closure = ktrace.maybe_closure()
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 439, in maybe_closure
    if self.closure is not None:
RuntimeError: unrecognized NodeKind: Tanh
body_text:
It is missing nderivs=0 so it never runs and silently passes. When I fix it, I then get:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_jit.py", line 174, in test_traced_module
    out2 = lstm(input, (hx, cx))
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 259, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 361, in __new_forward
    closure = ktrace.maybe_closure()
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 439, in maybe_closure
    if self.closure is not None:
RuntimeError: unrecognized NodeKind: Tanh
body:
It is missing `nderivs=0` so it never runs and silently passes. When I fix it, I then get:

```
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_jit.py", line 174, in test_traced_module
    out2 = lstm(input, (hx, cx))
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 259, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 361, in __new_forward
    closure = ktrace.maybe_closure()
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/torch/jit.py", line 439, in maybe_closure
    if self.closure is not None:
RuntimeError: unrecognized NodeKind: Tanh

```
